H0.text: Breathing clean air is how people get energy and nutrients.

H1.text: Exercising and playing are how people get energy and nutrients.

H2.text: Getting plenty of rest is how people get energy and nutrients.

H3.text: Eating healthy food is how people get energy and nutrients.

A4.text: The macronutrients (excluding fiber and water) provide structural material and energy.

A5.text: Essential nutrients cannot be synthesized by the body, and must be obtained from food.
